definition: a complaint uttered in a plaintive whining way, complain whiningly
details:
noun
- a complaint uttered in a plaintive whining way
= synonyms: whimper
verb
- complain whiningly
= synonyms: grizzle
- talk in a tearful manner
= synonyms: snivel
- move with a whining sound
- make a high-pitched, screeching noise
= synonyms: squeak
